pages.text: Frost Shards are a very rare drop from Snowmen in the $(l:patchouli_jam:cold_snap_horde/horde)Cold Snap Horde$(). It can be used to craft Frost Cores and the Top Hat. The Top Hat will make the Cold Snap Horde think that you're a part of them, but you will have to put it on while they don't see you.

The thermometer allows you to check the temperature of your current biome. If the thermometer reads cold, you are likely to see a member of the horde when dusk falls. They have however been known to appear in warm environments as well at times...
